name: Sanmar Shipyards
description: Sanmar has been providing services to the world’s leading operators since 1976 and is now leading the industry towards a new era of environmentally-friendly low and no-emission tugboats.Using often exclusive designs from leading naval architects Robert Allan Ltd, Sanmar’s wide portfolio of vessels, constructed at its two eco-friendly purpose-built shipyards in Turkiye, now includes ground-breaking battery electric tugs, and tugboats using alternative fuels such as LNG and methanol.With a large stock of tugs for immediate delivery and a big team of engineers ready to develop custom solutions, Sanmar is ready to deliver well-equipped vessels that meet the highest standards of finish, comfort, and safety.Sanmar’s clients include many major international operators involved in a wide range of specialist activities, often in challenging conditions, including towage, ship-handling, salvage, emergency response and offshore operations. More information on Sanmar can be found on: www.sanmar.com.

More information on Sanmar can be found on: www.sanmar.com.

name: Aesen Midad
description: Established in 2015, Aesen Midad Company is Aesen Group's joint-venture set up with Midad Holdings in Saudi Arabia to service clients in the region, given that the majority of vessels in the Western Hemisphere region are working in the Kingdom. Aesen Midad has a dedicated operations office at Ras Tanura which caters to local client requirements, at the same time driving economical investment through local spend. The set up in Ras Tanura also includes a fully equipped workshop with in-house capabilities to overhaul mechanical and electrical equipment, and provide repair and maintenance allowing fast turnaround for our vessels.In addition, Aesen Midad has a branch office in Al Khobar for commercial and administrative support. Aesen Midad participates in the In Kingdom Total Value Add (IKTVA) Program by hiring local Saudi staff to promote Saudisation, which drives domestic value and provides training and development opportunities.

name: WCI Marltime Services S.A.
description: WCI MARITIME SERVICES is a ship supply, ship agency and a manufacturer company of technical lines. Our main advantage as Ship Suppliers is that we are MANUFACTURERS of specific lines, where control the quality and provide better prices.  Under our WCI brand, we produce:- WCI Pilot Ladders (approved makers by Lloyd´s Register) - WCI Mix Mooring Ropes & Wire Ropes (Certified by ABS and DNV).- WCI Tank Cleaning & Hold Cleaning Chemicals (IMO approved).- WCI Mega Batteries (Electric batteries - Marine type).- WCI Life Safety Division by Rongscheng (EEBD, SCBA, Food Rations, Water Rations, Immersion Suits, etc) Fire extinguishers by Jiangsu and Pyrotechnics by Albatross.  Also we have or LSE and FFP service station. In our General Ship Supply division, we import and commercialize: - Dry, ethnic and frozen provisions. - IMPA consumable stores.  We are a wholesale ship supply company in Panama, South America and United Arab Emirates.   Our supply points are: Panama, United Arab Emirates, Singapore, China, Korea, USA, Chile, Colombia, Peru, Ecuador, Brazil and Spain.

name: Ampelmann Operations B.V.
description: Ampelmann is the leading offshore access provider that delivers safe and efficient access solutions to the global offshore energy sector. Its innovative approach to offshore access has propelled the company forwards as a key global player with strong local presences in Europe, Africa, Asia Pacific and the Americas. Ampelmann’s diverse portfolio of modular and energy efficient gangways is tailored to meet every local and global demand, providing reliable and consistent access to offshore installations in a variety of sea states and weather conditions. The company’s growing fleet of gangway systems includes solutions for crew change, cargo and decommissioning operations in the offshore oil and gas, wind and floating wind markets. The company operates on a full-service business model and provides its renting and buying clients with trained operators, 24/7 operational support and digital management tools to improve uptime and ensure maximum efficiency during offshore operations.

name: Cargostore Worldwide Trading Ltd
description: Cargostore Worldwide delivers easy DNV and ISO container leasing globally. We have a full range of equipment for both long-term contracts and short-term hires. Thanks to our extensive global network of depots, we have what you need, ready to go, whenever you need it.Our diverse range of equipment includes containers, baskets, reefers, waste skips, tanks, and specialist equipment. We also modify units to meet your exact specifications.We’re proud to be certified to the ISO 9001 International Standard for Quality Management Systems, supporting clients in Offshore Wind, Oil and Gas, Catering, ISO (Sea, Road & Rail), Stability & Aid, and Mining. name: MarFlex Europe B.V.
description: With over 40 years of experience, MarFlex designs and manufactures electric-driven deepwell pumps for all types of chemicals and oils, used on inland barges, tankers, and offshore platforms worldwide.Our systems are built for harsh conditions and optimized to operate within their operational excellence area , regardless of liquid type, tank levels, or process variables. This approach avoids energy waste and cavitation, ensuring longer pump life, lower operating costs, and safer operations.Guided by our “Pumping for Life” philosophy, we focus on energy efficiency, durability, and crew safety—delivering solutions that protect both people and the planet.
htmlDescription:
With over 40 years of experience, MarFlex designs and manufactures electric-driven deepwell pumps for all types of chemicals and oils, used on inland barges, tankers, and offshore platforms worldwide.

Our systems are built for harsh conditions and optimized to operate within their operational excellence area , regardless of liquid type, tank levels, or process variables. This approach avoids energy waste and cavitation, ensuring longer pump life, lower operating costs, and safer operations.

Guided by our “Pumping for Life” philosophy, we focus on energy efficiency, durability, and crew safety—delivering solutions that protect both people and the planet.

name: HPC Hamburg Port Consulting GmbH
description: HPC Hamburg Port Consulting is a global port consultancy specializing in planning, managing, and optimizing services for the ports, terminals, and rail sectors. Since its establishment in 1976, the Hamburg-based consulting company has delivered 1,800 projects across 135 countries along the entire port project development cycle. HPC employs about 100 domain experts with a background as terminal operators, software engineers, engineers, logistics managers, transport economists, data scientists and mathematicians. As a subsidiary of the Hamburg Port and Logistics Corporation (HHLA), HPC has its roots in port handling of container, breakbulk and multipurpose, as well as hinterland operations.

name: Artemis Technologies Ltd
description: Based in Belfast, Northern Ireland, Artemis Technologies is at the forefront of the maritime industry’s push towards decarbonisation. With global manufacturing capabilities and a strategic office in New York, their revolutionary Artemis eFoiler® electric propulsion system, featuring a high-voltage battery energy storage system and ultra-high power density electric drivetrain, sets a new standard in maritime transport. The Artemis EF-12 Pilot boat is part of a range of 100% electric foiling vessels designed for commercial use. Other vessels from Artemis Technologies include the Artemis EF-12 Workboat, Artemis EF-24 Passenger, a 150-passenger ferry, and a luxury water taxi, the Artemis EF-12 Escape. For more information on Artemis Technologies visit: www.artemistechnologies.co.uk.

name: Roxtec Saudi Arabia for Manufacturing LLC
description: Roxtec – flexible and innovative cable and pipe transitsRoxtec sealing solutions provide certified protection against multiple risks such as fire, gas and water. The seals are available in different versions and materials in order to cover the needs and requirements of any project within shipbuilding, oil and gas, energy, infrastructure and the manufacturing and process industries. You can use Roxtec entry seals in walls, floors, decks and bulkheads as well as in cabinets and enclosures. The product range includes solutions for EMC, bonding, grounding and for use in underground applications and hazardous locations (Ex).    With Roxtec cable and pipe transits you ensure safe operations and save time in all phases, from design and installation through to inspection and retrofit. Roxtec has invented Multidiameter™ for flexibility through sealing modules with removable layers. It enables sealing of multiple cables and pipes of different sizes in each opening and gives you an option to design with capacity for future needs.  Roxtec also provides the free, online tool Roxtec Transit Designer™ which simplifies product selection and the entire engineering process.  The Roxtec sealing system is ingeniously made to help you protect life and assets.

name: Robban Assafina
description: Robban Assafina, the regional maritime media platform has been sailing in the maritime reporting and networking since 2009, with direct connections to regional and international decision makers, who ensured a high level of participation, and still, in all accomplished activities and events.  Robban Assafina is keen to provide an effective yard for access, exchange of maritime knowledge and networking. With our progressive and synergistic maritime approach, we are able to offer distinguished themes and new directions for you to navigate your course safely and seek the best opportunities for your business development.  Robban Assafina, the unique maritime MENA publication, website, and smart phones’ application, is a regional intensive maritime media services developed side by side with training courses/workshops in several countries in the Middle East and North Africa Region, with a specialized crew of maritime experts, masters & engineers, who focus directly on shipping, shipbuilding, ships, ports, offshore, and everything related to the world of marine navigation, communication and machineries.[ar]: منذ عام 2009، تقدم "ربان السفينة"، المنصة الإعلامية البحرية الإقليمية المطبوعة والإكترونية، الأخبار والتقارير البحرية وفرص التواصل المتنوعة، من خلال نقاط اتصال مباشرة بصنّاع القرار الإقليميين والدوليين، الذين ضمنوا مستوى عالٍ من المشاركة في جميع الأنشطة والفعاليات منذ نشأتها حتى اليوم.توفر هذه المنصة الإعلامية فرصة للتواصل وتبادل المعرفة البحرية،؛ ومن خلال نهجنا البحري. نقدم عبر "ربان السفينة" موضوعات مميزة وتوجيهات جديدة لعملائنا تضمن البحث عن أفضل الفرص لتطوير أعمالهم.هذه المطبوعة البحرية الفريدة من نوعها في منطقة الشرق الأوسط وشمال إفريقيا، إلى جانب ما تقدمه من خدمات إلكترونية من خلال الموقع الإلكتروني وتطبيق الهواتف الذكية، هي عبارة عن خدمات وسائط بحرية إقليمية غنية بمحتواها تم تطويرها جنباً إلى جنب مع الدورات التدريبية وورش العمل القائمة حول آخر التطورات البحرية في العديد من بلدان منطقة الشرق الأوسط وشمال إفريقيا، بطاقم متخصص من خبراء بحريين وأساتذة ومهندسين يركزون بشكل مباشر على مواضيع النقل البحري، بناء السفن، الأوفشور والموانئ وكل ما يتعلق بعالم الملاحة البحرية والاتصالات.

name: NDT CORROSION CONTROL SERVICES CO.,
description: NDT CCS stands as a beacon of excellence in Non-Destructive Testing and Inspection Services, with over four decades of unparalleled expertise. Established in 1975 by Abdulla Al Shuwayer Co. in Dammam, Saudi Arabia, our footprint now extends across the GCC region and beyond. With branches and subsidiaries in Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Bahrain, and Qatar, we take great pride in catering to a diverse clientele from the Oil and Gas, Power & Water, Nuclear, Marine, Infrastructure and Mining sectors. We confidently offer a comprehensive range of inspection services, including Advanced NDT, Conventional NDT, Heat Treatment, OCTG & Lifting Inspection, Third-Party Inspection Services, Rope Access, Asset Integrity Management, Marine Inspection, Robotic, Drone, and ROV-based services, Industrial Testing Laboratories, and Welder qualification services. Through strategic international partnerships, we deliver specialized inspection solutions such as Acoustic Emission Services, LEOSCAN, Gamma scan services, Pipeline Inline Inspections, and Furnace Decoking Services with utmost confidence and expertise. Our accredited laboratories in the GCC region offer Mechanical, Metallurgical, Chemical, and Concrete testing services. In addition, we supply highly skilled NDT, API, Welding, Electrical, Civil, Mechanical, and QA/QC Inspectors/Engineers/Technicians to meet technical workforce requirements. At NDT CCS, we are dedicated to meeting and surpassing our customers' needs. We uphold the highest service standards in the industry, adhering to our Quality Management System (QMS) standard ISO 9001:2015, Environmental Management System ISO14001:2015, and Occupational Health & Safety Management System ISO45001:2018. Our approval by major classification societies, including ABS, DNV, Lloyds Register, Bureau Veritas, RINA, and NK, underscores our unwavering commitment to quality and safety.

name: IRM Offshore and Marine / DLPS
description: IRM Offshore and Marine Engineers Pvt Ltd has been a pioneer in manufacturing rubber engineering and heavy fabricated products for the Marine and Offshore industry for over 60 years. Serving over 85 countries with the strong network of 40 sales partners worldwide, IRM caters to ports, offshore oil & gas, offshore wind farms & shipyards with various solutions, including marine and pneumatic fenders, dock accessories, and offshore installation aids. With its global headquarters and manufacturing facility in Ahmadabad - India, the company also operates a technical sales and service support center, along with a stockyard in the Netherlands, UAE and Singapore. name: Red Sea Gateway Terminal
description: Red Sea Gateway Terminal (RSGT) is Saudi Arabia’s first privately funded terminal operator (BOT), headquartered in Jeddah. RSGT operates the country’s largest and most advanced container terminal at Jeddah Islamic Port, accounting for approximately 39% of Saudi Arabia’s container throughput in 2024 and offering 6.2 million TEU of annual capacity.To serve a broader range of customers and cargo types, RSGT offers Multi-Purpose Terminals (MPT) services through a dedicated business unit that manages non-containerized cargo across four strategic locations on Saudi Arabia’s Red Sea coast. The portfolio spans Jeddah Islamic Port (integrating general cargo and Ro-Ro into a single multi-purpose facility), King Fahd Industrial Port in Yanbu, Yanbu Commercial Port, and Port of Jazan, adding roughly 13.4 km of quay and 3.3 million m² of operational area. Across these sites, RSGT handles general cargo, dry bulk, liquid bulk, Ro-Ro, project/heavy-lift cargo, and livestock. A planned SAR 1.6 billion upgrade program will modernize infrastructure, equipment, and digital systems and introduce energy-efficient technologies.Across container and multi-purpose operations, RSGT focuses on reliable performance, safety, and sustainability, leveraging digital yard management, smart gate processing, and data-driven asset reliability, with a roadmap that includes electric handling equipment and shore-power readiness where feasible.
htmlDescription:
Red Sea Gateway Terminal (RSGT) is Saudi Arabia’s first privately funded terminal operator (BOT), headquartered in Jeddah. RSGT operates the country’s largest and most advanced container terminal at Jeddah Islamic Port, accounting for approximately 39% of Saudi Arabia’s container throughput in 2024 and offering 6.2 million TEU of annual capacity.

To serve a broader range of customers and cargo types, RSGT offers Multi-Purpose Terminals (MPT) services through a dedicated business unit that manages non-containerized cargo across four strategic locations on Saudi Arabia’s Red Sea coast. The portfolio spans Jeddah Islamic Port (integrating general cargo and Ro-Ro into a single multi-purpose facility), King Fahd Industrial Port in Yanbu, Yanbu Commercial Port, and Port of Jazan, adding roughly 13.4 km of quay and 3.3 million m² of operational area. Across these sites, RSGT handles general cargo, dry bulk, liquid bulk, Ro-Ro, project/heavy-lift cargo, and livestock. A planned SAR 1.6 billion upgrade program will modernize infrastructure, equipment, and digital systems and introduce energy-efficient technologies.

Across container and multi-purpose operations, RSGT focuses on reliable performance, safety, and sustainability, leveraging digital yard management, smart gate processing, and data-driven asset reliability, with a roadmap that includes electric handling equipment and shore-power readiness where feasible.

name: Saudi Global Ports Co.
description: Saudi Global Ports (SGP) is Saudi Arabia’s leading port operator and a trusted partner of the region’s ports and logistics ecosystem. Currently, SGP operates deepsea container terminals at King Abdulaziz Port Dammam and operates the Riyadh Dry Port Ecosystem (Riyadh Dry Port, Riyadh Empty Yard and Dammam Empty Container Yard). King Abdulaziz Port Dammam is Saudi Arabia’s maritime gateway on the Arabian Gulf and is connected to the Riyadh Dry Port Ecosystem and major cities in Saudi Arabia through extensive rail and road networks. With its growing portfolio, SGP works alongside its customers and partners to develop port ecosystems enabling the delivery of reliable, innovative, and sustainable supply chain solutions connecting Saudi Arabia to the world. SGP is a joint venture between the Public Investment Fund (PIF), Al Blagha Group and PSA International (PSA). PSA is a leading global port operator and trusted partner to cargo stakeholders across more than 170 locations in 45 countries. Visit us at www.saudiglobalports.com.sa, or follow us on LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter (@SaudiGlobalPorts).

name: King Abdullah Port
description: King Abdullah Port is the first privately owned, developed and operated port in the Middle East, and was recently ranked as the most efficient container port in the world in 2022 report by The World Bank. Strategically located on the coast of the Red Sea in King Abdullah Economic City, King Abdullah Port occupies an area of 17.4 km2 and is in proximity to the cities of Jeddah, Holy Mecca, Medina and Yanbu. The port is directly connected to a diverse and extensive global transportation network that facilitates the transport of goods to and from various provinces within Saudi Arabia. King Abdullah Port continues to make vital contributions to the Kingdom’s global role in maritime trade and logistics. Once completed, the port will be equipped to handle 25 million TEU, 25 million tons of bulk cargo, as well as 1.5 million CEU annually according to the port’s master development plan. Featuring the world’s deepest 18-m berths, industry-leading processing facilities, multi-level expanding operations, fully integrated Port Community and Smart Gate E-Systems and multipurpose bonded and re-export zones, King Abdullah Port embodies excellence within the private sector in helping to achieve the objectives of the Kingdom’s Vision 2030.

name: Saudi LIEBHERR Co. Ltd
description: Saudi Liebherr Company Ltd was founded in 1983 under a joint venture agreement with a local partner, E.A Juffali & Brothers. Saudi Liebherr exclusively distributes the entire range of Liebherr construction machines in Saudi Arabia, through its head office in Jeddah and two branches in Dammam and Riyadh region. The main products are mobile cranes, tower cranes, mobile harbor cranes, rubber tyre gantry cranes, ship to shore cranes, reachstackers, wheel and crawler excavators, wheel loaders, mining dozers, mining excavators and mining trucks, concrete truck mixers, concrete pumps and concrete batching plants. The product range is supplemented by exquisite aftersales in the form of available spare parts and experienced service team. In 2016, the Company established a state of the art service center in Dammam to cater the needs of our valuable customers in the Eastern Region. Moreover, the Company has been locally assembling Concrete Mixers with Liebherr Quality Standards and fulfilling the demand of both Saudi Arabia as well as other countries in the middle east region. The Company is privileged to participate in several landmark construction projects in Saudi Arabia, namely Makkah Clock Tower, Haram Expansion, Jeddah International Airport, Riyadh Metro Project and Financial District Riyadh”.

name: Through Transport Mutual Services (UK) Ltd
description: TT Club is the established market-leading independent provider of mutual insurance and related risk management services to the international transport and logistics industry. The Club’s services include specialist underwriting, claims management and risk and loss management advice, supported by a global office network. TT Club’s mission is to make the industry safer, more secure and more sustainable.  Established in 1968, TT Club currently services more than 1400 Members – container owners, operators, ports, terminals and logistics companies. Its membership covers the entire logistics journey, working across maritime, road, rail, and air ranging from some of the world’s largest logistics operators to smaller, bespoke companies managing similar risks. The Club is renowned for its high-quality service, in-depth industry knowledge and enduring Member loyalty. Its average annual customer retention rate is consistently over 95%, with some Members having chosen to insure with the Club for over 50 years. TT Club is managed by Thomas Miller - an independent and international provider of insurance, professional and investment services.

name: PMO Global Contracting Company
Mwani Qatar
description: Day to day, Mwani Qatar is responsible for managing the nation’s seaports and shipping terminals, but the integrated port and logistics services provider is also playing a more pivotal role. As an integrated provider of port and logistics services, the company is not only strongly positioned to develop a regional shipping hub in the region, but also to play a major role in diversifying the Qatari economy ready for a post-hydrocarbon future.Mwani Qatar is responsible for Hamad Port and Al Ruwais Port which are commercial ports, as well as Doha Port dedicated to handling cruise ship. Hamad Port, Qatar's main gateway to world trade, is one of the largest commercial ports in the Middle East, with a total area of 28.5 sq.m and a capacity of 7.5 million TEUs annually. With its modern facilities and its growing shipping network that provides direct and indirect services to more than 100 destinations around the world, Hamad Port unleashes the potential of commercial and investment opportunities in Qatar, as Mwani Qatar moves forward in developing sustainable ports along with building global logistical supply chains, contributing to achieving the Ministry of Transports’ strategic plan aimed to transform Qatar into a vibrant regional trading hub. As a vital support to the infrastructure and projects in Qatar, Mwani Qatar under the guidance of the Ministry of Transport & Communications closely works with stakeholders and partners to increase cargo volumes both inbound and outbound and establish its entities preferred ports of call for all shipping lines. Alongside its oversight of the country’s quays, dry ports, and container terminals, Mwani Qatar also provides navigation assistance and pilotage, towage, as well as Aids to Navigation (AtoNs) and has an ambitious plan to expand regionally and internationally through the acquisition and operation of ports around the world.

name: Zamil Offshore Services Company
description: Zamil Offshore, a wholly owned Zamil Group Holding company, has been offering diversified offshore and marine support services to the oil and gas industry since 1977.Its core business includes offshore marine services, ship chartering, ship chandelling, offshore and onshore, engineering and construction services, including turnkey hook-up services, shipbuilding, ship and rig maintenance along with seaport operations.The company’s offshore marine services division, Zamil Marine Services, manages 68 offshore support vessels, of which 46 are entirely owned and the rest brokered. These include diesel electric and Rolls Royce UT 733-2 anchor handling tug, supply, and safety vessels; DP-2 multi-purpose mufti role diving ROV support vessels, supply boats, work boats, utility boats, crew boats and one jack-up self-propelled lift boat. The majority of Zamil fleet vessels are on long-term charter with Saudi Aramco. Zamil Marine also has a joint venture with Mermaid Maritime to offer end-to-end project management solutions for subsea work. The ‘’Zamil Mermaid Offshore Services’’ was established to undertake Saudi Aramco projects related to inspection, maintenance, installation, fixing offshore facilities, underwater facilities and underwater welding works.Another key division is Zamil Offshore Construction, which is a specialist in the execution of offshore and onshore services for the oil and gas industry, including hook-up projects, maintenance, upgrade, modification and commissioning support for offshore facilities and platforms. The division has been awarded several projects from Saudi Aramco for hook up and offshore maintenance services. Zamil Offshore Construction, through its Joint Venture SBS Oceanics, also provides full EPCI services for small and medium sized brownfield modifications and upgrades. The joint venture has been awarded numerous projects being executed under this model from Saudi Aramco.The Zamil Shipyards division on the other hand executes shipbuilding, ship and rig repair and general fabrication projects. Its highly skilled team consists of certified technicians and experienced marine engineers and naval architects covering all aspects and disciplines associated with its core activities.Zamil Shipyards recently signed a Joint Venture Agreement to deliver world-class Offshore Support Vessel (OSV) services with International Maritime Industries (IMI). The new company, National Shipbuilding International Company (NSIC) and will enhance the Kingdom’s localization efforts and will absorb the Zamil enviable track record of building and performing maintenance, repair and overhaul services (MRO) in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Combined with IMI’s state-of-the-art facilities we are confident that NSIC will not only address the needs of the local market, but also go beyond that and compete in the regional and international arena.Zamil Offshore has the competitive advantage in Dammam through its management of the King Abdul Aziz Port, where its largest shipyard is located. The company manages around 2,500 movements in and out of the port facility every year enabling clients access to the port and its various facilities, such as tugboats, floating cranes, which the Zamil crew operate.

name: Sedres Trading & Maritime Services Co. Ltd
description: Sedres Maritime is a prominent figure in the marine and logistics industry, with a solid foundation laid in Saudi Arabia since 1993. The company has evolved into a full-service provider, offering a comprehensive range of solutions encompassing shipping agency, crew change management, freight forwarding, transportation, customs clearance, and ship chandelling. This all-encompassing suite of services, coupled with Sedres' exceptional ability to customize solutions to meet the specific needs of each client, has solidified its position as a preferred partner for businesses operating within the region. With a strategically positioned network of offices in Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, and the UAE, Sedres ensures seamless operations and efficient service delivery. The company's headquarters in Jubail, a thriving industrial hub, underscores its unwavering commitment to serving the burgeoning maritime and logistics demands of the region. By amalgamating profound industry expertise, a global outlook, and a robust local presence, Sedres has cemented its reputation as a trusted ally for clients seeking reliable and efficient marine and logistics solutions. Beyond core services, Sedres Maritime distinguishes itself through its unwavering dedication to customer satisfaction, operational excellence, and adherence to industry best practices. The company's commitment to innovation and technological advancements enables it to stay at the forefront of industry trends, providing clients with cutting-edge solutions. With a strong emphasis on safety, compliance, and environmental responsibility, Sedres operates with the highest standards of integrity and professionalism. Website: https://www.sedres.com/

name: MOBILIS
description: Since 1990,  MOBILIS is designing and manufacturing Aids to Navigation equipment: navigational buoys, mooring buoys and data buoys.   From our in-house factory based in France, MOBILIS supply quality and reliable equipment's for long life use at sea.   In KSA, MOBILIS manufactured and delivered for Red Sea Global (TRSDC) the following equipment in Sindalah Island: 74 mooring buoys for superyachts up to 180 meters. 74 eco friendly mooring lines with subsurface floats for no damaging seabed. 250 nav buoys + mooring lines. 1 metocean buoy + mooring lines.   We are waiting you at our booth to discuss about your project!

name: Portwest
description: Portwest is a global manufacturer and innovator of workwear, safety wear and PPE. Established in 1904, Portwest today has a global distribution network and customer service staff in over 130 countries. The company is a family-owned business and continues to be managed by the 3rd generation of the Hughes Family and since 2015 the 4th generation of the family have joined the business. Innovative production and design by an in-house team of experts lies at the heart of the Portwest advantage.Employing over 5,100 people worldwide, Portwest has a team of world class designers who specialise in flame-resistant and high-visibility workwear, hand and foot protection, PPE and wearable technology. Market leaders in safety, Portwest’s award winning team is constantly researching the latest trends and innovations which meet and exceed customer’s needs.Portwest’s 848-page catalogue is available in 28 languages and features 1350+ safety styles insuring Portwest has your industry covered for all safety wear requirements.Portwest own four ultra-modern factories in Bangladesh, Myanmar, Italy and Albania, giving full control over their exceptional quality, lead times and ethical sourcing. Portwest’s reputation for technical know-how, rigorous implementation and attention to style and detail is well proven. Consistent colours, fabric qualities, good fit and competitive pricing are taken as a given by customers.With sales offices in 8 global locations (UK, USA, Australia, UAE, Ireland, Italy, Spain and Poland) and customer support staff in 130 countries ensure unrivalled customer service is never far away. In addition, Portwest has 8 international warehouses (UK, USA, Australia, UAE, Ireland, Italy, Spain and Poland) with a line fill rate of 96% guaranteeing excellent stock levels at all times. Portwest give a no risk proposition in an industry where safety is paramount.

name: Exalto Emirates
description: Our journey began as we set sail in 1994. In less than three decades, we have positioned ourselves as the number one marine equipment and supplies distributor of premium brands in the Middle East. Today, the company represents over 129 reputed international manufacturers of high-quality marine parts, equipment and accessories. We are the first port of call for various marine industries – from leisure to commercial, Offshore Oil & Gas to Government Services. We take immense pride in being able to provide a comprehensive portfolio of products. So, whether you are a marine industry professional or a boating enthusiast, a boat builder or a shipyard, a service operator or a fleet owner; Exalto Emirates can fulfill your requirements.Our Head Office is located in Sharjah with a branch office in Abu Dhabi and Dubai. This allows us to efficiently supply within the UAE, across the GCC, the greater Middle East, Africa, the Indian subcontinent and beyond. We also have a large and well-stocked warehouse to meet any customer needs as well as a service center that provides seamless support for installation, commissioning, service and warranty. Exalto Emirates’s team of professionals includes a number of marine, mechanical and electrical engineers and naval architects, which allows us to provide specialized engineering and design advice for all manner of projects, customized to any requirement.

name: Garnet Arabia Company Ltd
description: GMA Garnet Group (GMA) is the trusted global leader in industrial garnet. For over 40 years, we have been providing the highest quality garnet to the waterjet cutting and protective coating industries. We offer secure garnet supplies, deep expert advice and a complete range of premium abrasive products for improved, fast and effective results. We manage a unique operation where we own our mines and processing plants in Australia, the USA and the Middle East. We have also invested significantly in expanding our production capacity and sources of supply. As GMA is the only garnet supplier that owns the source, processing and distribution of our products, we not only set the highest standards, but consistently deliver to these standards. Our dedicated sales teams and technical experts seek to understand our customers’ priorities and challenges to ensure our products are engineered to deliver optimal results. GMA’s garnet products are developed from alluvial, crushed and recycled sources, formulated to achieve specific performance outcomes. GMA has also led the industry in environmentally sustainable production, including the development of recycling technologies that offer a friendly solution for the disposal of used garnet. Our headquarters are in Perth, Australia, with offices, warehouses and distributors in major industrial hubs throughout Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East and the Americas. Globally, over 500 dedicated employees manage our operations which comprise of 13 offices, two garnet mines and eight processing plants including five large scale recycling facilities. Today, GMA Garnet products are distributed in more than 100 countries worldwide, directly from our own warehouses and through more than 90 distributor outlets.

name: Stanford Marine & Allianz Middle East
description: Established in 1997, Stanford Marine (SM) operates an extensive fleet of Offshore Supply Vessels that service the Oil and Gas industry in the Middle East, South East Asia and West Africa. With their headquarters in Dubai, they also have offices in Abu Dhabi, KSA, Qatar and Singapore. They offer a broad scope of services ranging from Vessel Chartering to Cross-Chartering and Vessel Management. Their multipurpose fleet of 37 vessels includes, Supply Vessels (PSV and SSV), Fast Crew Boats and Anchor Handlers (AHTS and AHT). With such a comprehensive range of vessels they offer solutions for a wide range of clients, from drilling support to logistics and offshore maintenance. To learn more about Stanford Marine, please visit www.stanford-marine.comAllianz Middle East specializes in managing and operating a diverse fleet of offshore vessels supporting the marine industry and offers a complete project management approach to onshore and offshore logistic needs. Headquartered in Abu Dhabi, Allianz operations covers Africa, the Arabian Gulf region, India, Far East and surrounding waters with the aim to further extend its global presence. They own and operate a fleet of 82 modern vessels and barges augmented by their ability to offer complete offshore logistics solutions and supply base operations. To learn more about Allianz, please visit: www.allianz-me.com

name: Gulftainer Company Ltd
description: Gulftainer, a UAE-based global end-to-end supply chain, logistics and multi-purpose ports solutions provider.It was established in the Emirate of Sharjah in 1976, and has since become a leading global supply chain and logistics solutions provider, with a global footprint of ports, terminals, warehouses and transport facilities. Through a continued collaboration between Sharjah Ports Authority and Gulftainer, the company was the first to operate a container terminal in the Middle East, which is Sharjah Container Terminal, and then Khorfakkan Container Terminal.Outside the UAE, Gulftainer’s portfolio encompasses managing container terminals such as Jubail Commercial Port in Saudi Arabia and the Umm Qasr Port in Iraq. Further afield, Gulftainer manages and operates Canaveral Cargo Terminal at Port Canaveral in Florida, USA.Its portfolio covers freight forwarding, supply chain operations and logistics through its subsidiary, Momentum Logistics.
htmlDescription:
Gulftainer, a UAE-based global end-to-end supply chain, logistics and multi-purpose ports solutions provider.

It was established in the Emirate of Sharjah in 1976, and has since become a leading global supply chain and logistics solutions provider, with a global footprint of ports, terminals, warehouses and transport facilities. Through a continued collaboration between Sharjah Ports Authority and Gulftainer, the company was the first to operate a container terminal in the Middle East, which is Sharjah Container Terminal, and then Khorfakkan Container Terminal.

Outside the UAE, Gulftainer’s portfolio encompasses managing container terminals such as Jubail Commercial Port in Saudi Arabia and the Umm Qasr Port in Iraq. Further afield, Gulftainer manages and operates Canaveral Cargo Terminal at Port Canaveral in Florida, USA.

Its portfolio covers freight forwarding, supply chain operations and logistics through its subsidiary, Momentum Logistics.

name: CMA CGM Saudi Arabia Ltd
description: About CMA CGM Led by Rodolphe SAADE, the CMA CGM Group is a global leader in sea, land, air, and logistics solutions. CMA CGM is also diversifying into the media sector. As the third-largest global container shipping company in terms of capacity, CMA CGM serves over 400 ports across five continents, supported by a fleet of more than 620 vessels. Through its subsidiary, CEVA Logistics, the Group is one of the top five global logistics players, managing over 11 million square meters of warehouse space worldwide. CMA Media, a subsidiary of CMA CGM and the third-largest private media group in France, includes RMC-BFM and a press division that brings together renowned titles such as La Provence, Corse Matin, La Tribune, and La Tribune Dimanche. Committed to the energy transition in maritime transport and a pioneer in the use of alternative fuels, the CMA CGM Group aims to achieve Net Zero Carbon by 2050.The CMA CGM Foundation responds to humanitarian crises requiring urgent action by leveraging the Group's maritime and logistics expertise to deliver humanitarian aid worldwide. The Foundation also undertakes initiatives to promote education for all and equal opportunities. Operating in 160 countries, the Group employs 160,000 people globally, including 20,000 in France, with nearly 6,000 based in Marseille, where its headquarters are located.

name: Sercel
description: Sercel's Marlin is a comprehensive platform designed to deliver a wide range of solutions within the Marine Oversight sector. It excels in various areas, such as enhancing scheduling efficiency by up to 75% in marine logistics, streamlining internal processes, centralizing data for a single source of truth, and establishing clear lines of accountability and responsibility. Marlin's solutions empower organizations to mitigate Health Safety Environment (HSE) incidences, detect bad practice, monitor infield operations, and provide a comprehensive operational overview for an efficient and effective response. A key strength of Marlin is its ability to serve as an operational hub that seamlessly integrates with other critical client systems.ABOUT SERCELFrom natural resources to earth and infrastructure monitoring, energy transition, and defense, Sercel is a pioneer in measuring and understanding the Earth’s subsurface in order to provide the highest-standard in solutions to its customers. Since 1956, Sercel has combined advanced technologies and geoscience to deliver the most precise data. The company, headquartered in Nantes, France, employs more than 1,500 people in over ten different countries around the world. To learn more, visit www.sercel.com.

name: Hutchison Ports Jazan
description: Hutchison Ports, under a concession agreement with the Royal Commission for Jubail and Yanbu, managing and operating the JCPDI Port, in Jazan Economic City, Jazan Region.Hutchison Ports Jazan, the greenfield project is Saudi Arabia’s south-western deep-water gateway to the industrial cluster and a population of 5 million people. The multipurpose port brings closer the global access for local traders and the emerging market in the surrounding region.The multipurpose port offers marine services and multipurpose cargo handling of bulk, breakbulk/general cargo and containers, including the hubs and port centric logistics services to their customers.Hutchison Ports Jazan is committed to bringing the state of the arts automation technology in their operations.Hutchison Ports is the world's leading port investor, developer, and operator with a network of port operations in 53 ports spanning 24 countries throughout Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, the Americas and Australasia. Over the years, Hutchison Ports has expanded into other logistics and transportation-related businesses, including cruise ship terminals, airport operations, distribution centres, rail services and ship repair facilities.In 2024 Hutchison Ports handled a combined throughput of 87.5 million twenty-foot equivalent
htmlDescription:
Hutchison Ports, under a concession agreement with the Royal Commission for Jubail and Yanbu, managing and operating the JCPDI Port, in Jazan Economic City, Jazan Region.

Hutchison Ports Jazan, the greenfield project is Saudi Arabia’s south-western deep-water gateway to the industrial cluster and a population of 5 million people. The multipurpose port brings closer the global access for local traders and the emerging market in the surrounding region.

The multipurpose port offers marine services and multipurpose cargo handling of bulk, breakbulk/general cargo and containers, including the hubs and port centric logistics services to their customers.

Hutchison Ports Jazan is committed to bringing the state of the arts automation technology in their operations.

Hutchison Ports is the world's leading port investor, developer, and operator with a network of port operations in 53 ports spanning 24 countries throughout Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, the Americas and Australasia. Over the years, Hutchison Ports has expanded into other logistics and transportation-related businesses, including cruise ship terminals, airport operations, distribution centres, rail services and ship repair facilities.

In 2024 Hutchison Ports handled a combined throughput of 87.5 million twenty-foot equivalent

name: ELM Company
description: وسط تطلعات وطنية ترسم مستقبلًا أكثر إشراقًا، كانت علم حاضرة منذ البدايات الرقمية، لتُعيد تعريف الممكن وتبتكر حلولًا تتجاوز التوقعات. بدأت مسيرتها في عام 1989 مركزًا للأبحاث، وانطلقت بصفتها شركة مستقلّة في 2002، واضعةً الابتكار والتغيير في قلب أعمالها. ومنذ ذلك الحين، ساهمت علم في تطوير عدد من الحلول الرقمية الوطنية المفصلية، من أبرزها تأسيس وتشغيل منصة "أبشر"، التي شكّلت نقطة تحوّل في تقديم الخدمات الحكومية.امتد دور علم ليشمل تنفيذ المشاريع التقنية، وتقديم خدمات إسناد الأعمال، والاستشارات، إلى جانب إطلاق منصات رقمية تخدم الأفراد والجهات والمنشآت. كما توسّعت الشركة على المستويين الإقليمي والدولي، وأُدرجت في السوق المالية السعودية "تداول"، مما عزّز مكانتها جهةً موثوقة في المجال التقني. وتواصل علم نموها العضوي وغير العضوي، مستندةً إلى ثقة عملائها ومساهميها، وماضيةً في صناعة أثر مستدام في المشهد الرقمي.elm is where vision meets action — where bold ideas turn into real-world solutions that shape the future.What began in 1989 as a research center evolved into a driving force for digital transformation. Since becoming an independent company in 2002, elm has been at the heart of Saudi Arabia’s digital journey — not just building systems, but creating impact. We led the way with platforms like Absher, transforming how millions of people access government services. But that was just the beginning. Today, elm delivers end-to-end digital products, business support services, and advisory solutions that empower individuals, enable organizations, and elevate entire sectors. Our reach now spans beyond borders. With regional expansion, strategic partnerships, and a strong presence on Saudi Arabia’s stock exchange (Tadawul), elm continues to grow — fueled by trust, curiosity, and a commitment to meaningful progress. We’re not just building technology. We’re building what’s next.
htmlDescription:
وسط تطلعات وطنية ترسم مستقبلًا أكثر إشراقًا، كانت علم حاضرة منذ البدايات الرقمية، لتُعيد تعريف الممكن وتبتكر حلولًا تتجاوز التوقعات. بدأت مسيرتها في عام 1989 مركزًا للأبحاث، وانطلقت بصفتها شركة مستقلّة في 2002، واضعةً الابتكار والتغيير في قلب أعمالها. ومنذ ذلك الحين، ساهمت علم في تطوير عدد من الحلول الرقمية الوطنية المفصلية، من أبرزها تأسيس وتشغيل منصة "أبشر"، التي شكّلت نقطة تحوّل في تقديم الخدمات الحكومية.

امتد دور علم ليشمل تنفيذ المشاريع التقنية، وتقديم خدمات إسناد الأعمال، والاستشارات، إلى جانب إطلاق منصات رقمية تخدم الأفراد والجهات والمنشآت. كما توسّعت الشركة على المستويين الإقليمي والدولي، وأُدرجت في السوق المالية السعودية "تداول"، مما عزّز مكانتها جهةً موثوقة في المجال التقني. وتواصل علم نموها العضوي وغير العضوي، مستندةً إلى ثقة عملائها ومساهميها، وماضيةً في صناعة أثر مستدام في المشهد الرقمي.

elm is where vision meets action — where bold ideas turn into real-world solutions that shape the future.

What began in 1989 as a research center evolved into a driving force for digital transformation. Since becoming an independent company in 2002, elm has been at the heart of Saudi Arabia’s digital journey — not just building systems, but creating impact. We led the way with platforms like Absher, transforming how millions of people access government services. But that was just the beginning. Today, elm delivers end-to-end digital products, business support services, and advisory solutions that empower individuals, enable organizations, and elevate entire sectors. Our reach now spans beyond borders. With regional expansion, strategic partnerships, and a strong presence on Saudi Arabia’s stock exchange (Tadawul), elm continues to grow — fueled by trust, curiosity, and a commitment to meaningful progress. We’re not just building technology. We’re building what’s next.

name: Globe Group
description: Founded in 1976, Globe Group has evolved into one of Saudi Arabia’s leading marine and logistics service providers, marking nearly 50 years of consistent growth and strategic expansion. What began as a marine-focused enterprise has developed into a multifaceted organization, offering a broad range of services including shipping, logistics, transportation, container terminal management, port operations, operations and maintenance (O&M), and support for petrochemical facilities. The Group has also successfully diversified into real estate, hospitality, and retail fashion, showcasing its adaptability and forward-thinking business strategy.Globe Group’s sustained success is rooted in a strong commitment to professionalism, sustainability, and social responsibility. Its mission is to create value for stakeholders, enhance financial performance, and consistently improve operational efficiency. The Group places a high priority on investing in its people, ensuring that employees are empowered, skilled, and aligned with its long-term vision.Core values such as Integrity, Trust, Teamwork, Knowledge, and Quality are at the heart of Globe Group’s identity, guiding decision-making and fostering a culture of excellence and reliability.With decades of experience and a forward-looking mindset, Globe Group plays a pivotal role in advancing Saudi Arabia’s maritime and logistics landscape in alignment with Vision 2030. The Group operates across diverse sectors through specialized divisions, including:Marine Services: Shipping, port operations, and vessel support.Logistics & Transportation: Land transport, container terminals, freight forwarding, and 3PL solutions through Globe Logistics.Tank Depot & Container Services: ISO tank handling, cleaning, inspection, and container maintenance.GLOBE Academy: Industry-focused training programs designed to upskill professionals in maritime, logistics, safety, and operations.Real Estate & Retail: Investments in residential, commercial, and retail developments, including hospitality and fashion.Operations & Maintenance: Facility management services for industrial and petrochemical sectors.With its integrated service model and national footprint, Globe Group continues to deliver smart, efficient, and sustainable solutions, reinforcing its reputation as a trusted partner and industry leader both locally and globally.
htmlDescription:
Founded in 1976, Globe Group has evolved into one of Saudi Arabia’s leading marine and logistics service providers, marking nearly 50 years of consistent growth and strategic expansion. What began as a marine-focused enterprise has developed into a multifaceted organization, offering a broad range of services including shipping, logistics, transportation, container terminal management, port operations, operations and maintenance (O&M), and support for petrochemical facilities.

The Group has also successfully diversified into real estate, hospitality, and retail fashion, showcasing its adaptability and forward-thinking business strategy.

Globe Group’s sustained success is rooted in a strong commitment to professionalism, sustainability, and social responsibility. Its mission is to create value for stakeholders, enhance financial performance, and consistently improve operational efficiency. The Group places a high priority on investing in its people, ensuring that employees are empowered, skilled, and aligned with its long-term vision.

Core values such as Integrity, Trust, Teamwork, Knowledge, and Quality are at the heart of Globe Group’s identity, guiding decision-making and fostering a culture of excellence and reliability.

With decades of experience and a forward-looking mindset, Globe Group plays a pivotal role in advancing Saudi Arabia’s maritime and logistics landscape in alignment with Vision 2030. The Group operates across diverse sectors through specialized divisions, including:

Marine Services: Shipping, port operations, and vessel support.

Logistics & Transportation: Land transport, container terminals, freight forwarding, and 3PL solutions through Globe Logistics.

Tank Depot & Container Services: ISO tank handling, cleaning, inspection, and container maintenance.

GLOBE Academy: Industry-focused training programs designed to upskill professionals in maritime, logistics, safety, and operations.

Real Estate & Retail: Investments in residential, commercial, and retail developments, including hospitality and fashion.

Operations & Maintenance: Facility management services for industrial and petrochemical sectors.

With its integrated service model and national footprint, Globe Group continues to deliver smart, efficient, and sustainable solutions, reinforcing its reputation as a trusted partner and industry leader both locally and globally.

name: Lloyd's Register
description: Lloyd’s Register (LR) is a global professional services group specialising in marine engineering, technology and digital solutions. We were created more than 260 years ago as the world’s first marine classification society to improve and set standards for the safety of ships.Today we are a leading provider of classification and compliance services to the marine and offshore industries, helping our clients design, construct and operate their assets to accepted levels of safety and environmental compliance.Our digital solutions are relied upon by more than 30,000 vessels, following the acquisition of OneOcean in 2022 and Ocean Technologies Group in 2024.In the race to zero emissions, our research, advisory and technical expertise and industry-firsts are supporting a safe, sustainable maritime energy transition.Lloyd’s Register Group is wholly owned by the Lloyd’s Register Foundation, a politically and financially independent global charity that promotes safety and education.
htmlDescription:
Lloyd’s Register (LR) is a global professional services group specialising in marine engineering, technology and digital solutions. We were created more than 260 years ago as the world’s first marine classification society to improve and set standards for the safety of ships.


Today we are a leading provider of classification and compliance services to the marine and offshore industries, helping our clients design, construct and operate their assets to accepted levels of safety and environmental compliance.


Our digital solutions are relied upon by more than 30,000 vessels, following the acquisition of OneOcean in 2022 and Ocean Technologies Group in 2024.In the race to zero emissions, our research, advisory and technical expertise and industry-firsts are supporting a safe, sustainable maritime energy transition.


Lloyd’s Register Group is wholly owned by the Lloyd’s Register Foundation, a politically and financially independent global charity that promotes safety and education.

name: Aramco
description: Aramco is one of the world's largest integrated energy and chemicals companies, creating value across the hydrocarbon chain, and delivering societal and economic benefits to people and communities around the globe who rely on the vital energy we supply.We are committed to playing a leading role in the energy transition. We have a responsibility to help the world achieve a net-zero economy, and our people are working hard to help solve the world's sustainability challenges.For our customers, we are a supplier of choice. For our shareholders, we provide long-term value creation. htmlDescription:
Aramco is one of the world's largest integrated energy and chemicals companies, creating value across the hydrocarbon chain, and delivering societal and economic benefits to people and communities around the globe who rely on the vital energy we supply.


We are committed to playing a leading role in the energy transition. We have a responsibility to help the world achieve a net-zero economy, and our people are working hard to help solve the world's sustainability challenges.


For our customers, we are a supplier of choice. For our shareholders, we provide long-term value creation. For communities around the world, our ambition is to provide reliable, affordable, and more sustainable energy.




تتبوأ أرامكو مكانة رائدة بوصفها إحدى أكبر شركات الطاقة والكيميائيات المتكاملة في العالم، حيث تسعى إلى إيجاد القيمة عبر مختلف مراحل سلسلة الأعمال الهيدروكربونية، إلى جانب دفعها لعجلة التنمية الاقتصادية والمجتمعية في المجتمعات حول العالم التي تعتمد على إمدادات الطاقة التي نوفرها.


إننا نلتزم بدور رائد تجاه تحقيق التحول في الطاقة، كما نضطلع بمسؤوليتنا في مساعدة العالم للوصول إلى اقتصاد قائم على الحياد الصفري، حيث يبذل موظفونا وموظفاتنا جهودًا مستمرة للمساعدة في إيجاد حلول لتحديات الاستدامة.


وبينما يستمر سعينا لتعزيز موقعنا في الطليعة، سنظل المورّد المفضل لعملائنا، ونواصل تقديم القيمة بعيدة المدى لمساهمينا، مع طموحنا لإمداد المجتمعات حول العالم بطاقة موثوقة وأكثر استدامة وبأسعار معقولة.

htmlDescription:
DYNAMICNORD: Sustainable, innovative, and functional diving equipment


DYNAMICNORD is designed and engineered in Germany, made in Europe.

The international team combines extensive experience in the world of diving. DYNAMICNORD produces sustainable, innovative, and functional diving equipment: From regulators, computers, BCDs, suits, masks, snorkels, and fins to dry suits, bags, and accessories. DYNAMICNORD also offers a complete tech and freediving line as well as a swimwear series.

Whether you are a scuba diver, tech diver, rescue diver, military diver, or freediver, you will find your future favorite products with us

At DYNAMICNORD, we work every day to reduce our environmental impact in all manufacturing processes and throughout the life of the product.

DYNAMICNORD already recycles all plastic and glass parts of its masks. The inserts of the fin foot pocket are made from PP and TPR waste. The suspension hooks are made from PC waste.

Sustainability isn’t a trend, it’s a mission - our mission. It defines us, as every product we design, every material we choose, and every step we take reflects our commitment to preserving the planet for future generations. It’s not just what we do – it’s who we are.

Our Diving Gear – Fully tested
